subject: RE:  Your Simply Solar Solution quote request was submitted, thanks!
preview: @chris   Hi there,  I hope you are well. The site is having difficulty receiving emails from the https://simplysolarsolutions.com.au/ website, so we are setting up an SMTP account to see if this help

full_threads.body:
@chris

Hi there,

I hope you are well. The site is having difficulty receiving emails from the https://simplysolarsolutions.com.au/ website, so we are setting up an SMTP account to see if this helps.

Do you have access to your domain DNS records?

Please update the SPF record to be:
v=spf1 include:_spf.mailersend.net include:spf.jcr.com.au include:spf.protection.outlook.com -all

Add this TXT record please:

Name/host: mlsend._domainkey.simplysolarsolutions.com.au
Value: v=DKIM1;t=s;p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCvjMgLTqWqptd36JmNfIG5NG7dhFcG2+RcgmfzasGGJwb7rBH8w0c4lxP1wj+GAi4Vr9YmwVWwXNwLavmftkpsgr0JGscOfNtzXG6r9XFFwhZ0kq/LLKV14ePB4Av+RoFyWGWV2bxlROIYiNeG51HKXLFEIxhl7Xl4ZiEFVI19OQIDAQAB

CNAME:
Name/host: mta.simplysolarsolutions.com.au
Value: mailersend.net

Please let me know when updated. Thanks as always.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

An interesting one here.

These enquiry form notifications aren’t making it through to our client. Is there anything we can adjust at our end to help deliverability?

Site: https://simplysolarsolutions.com.au/


￼

Thanks!

Chris,

Yeh I will. Honestly don’t think they like me anymore because I am making them do their job. Any time I ask questions I feel like its so brushed off.. haha

Trying to play catch up. Clean some stuff up so they were not missed. I think a couple are there including the install sheet updated. When you get around to them. I will try remembering to shoot you email next time haha sorry!


S


From: Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, April 15, 2024 10:11 AM
To: Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Your Simply Solar Solution quote request was submitted, thanks!

Hi Shantell,

Got it. Are you able to share the screenshot with your IT guys? I can send a higher-resolution version if needed.

Also, I noticed a handful of install images added to the Dropbox. Please let me know if you like to add these on the fly, rather than waiting for a “Chris, new installs are ready” email.

Regards,



Chris Paradowski

On 15 Apr 2024, at 9:33 am, Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>> wrote:

Chris,

Havent seen it still must be getting blocked.

That’s okay will work off your email.

Thank you

From: Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, April 15, 2024 9:13 AM
To: Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Your Simply Solar Solution quote request was submitted, thanks!

Hi Shantell,

Thanks and likewise!

This was a Google Ads enquiry that was submitted on 05/04/24, a screenshot can be seen below. You are right, the email is peculiar. Perhaps it got flagged by your spam filters?

I have also resent the enquiry to: support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>, can you please tell me if it was received?

Regards,

On 15 Apr 2024, at 8:37 am, Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>> wrote:

Morning!
Hope you are well.

Could you shed some light on this enquiry ?

I have never seen them like this…. ? They don’t normally come to me??
is @email even a real email? And I have not even received the first request?

Thanks

Shantell

Sent: Monday, April 15, 2024 8:27 AM
To: Shantell Grubisic <support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au <mailto:support@simplysolarsolutions.com.au>>
Subject: Fwd: Your Simply Solar Solution quote request was submitted, thanks!

Hi,
Just wondering how you are travelling with my quote?
Thanks
Jay

Hi Jay Brotherston,

Thanks for submitting your quote request.

Our team will get back to you soon.

If you have any questions in the meantime, you are welcome to call us on 1300 294 447 <tel:1300%20294%20447>.

Thanks,

Rod and the team at Simply Solar Solutions.
